name: Codename: Nuclear
description:
Codename: Nuclear is an action adventure platformer following the of games such as Super Mario 64 or Banjo Kazooie, but in 2D. You play as Narf: the new intern for a secret scientific agency in a far-away island, and you'll have to face a mysterious force that nobody really knows about. Explore huge worlds filled with enemies and challenges, and use a huge range of weapons.

If you enjoyed games like Super Mario Bros, Crash Bandicoot, Sonic the Hedgehog or Ratchet & Clank, give Codename: Nuclear a try. You won't regret it.

  • EXPLORE vast worlds completing different and exciting missions.
  • BATTLE powerful and original bosses, including giant snakes and overpowered android rats.
  • MASTER more than 10 weapons, and use them originally to open up new parts of the island.
  • DOMINATE all 4 powerup suits, and plow through levels with their unique abilities.
  • UNLOCK secret levels and extra challenges
  • FIND OUT what's really going on in the island.
